plugins\/blink_camera\/plugin_info\/conf.Adresse de Jeedom à utiliser pour les UR: Jeedom address to use for URLs
plugins\/blink_camera\/plugin_info\/conf.La page doit être rechargée pour prendre: The page must be reloaded to reflect the changes. Would you like to reload the page now?
plugins\/blink_camera\/plugin_info\/conf.Connexion à votre compte Blink OK mais u: Blink account OK but a pin code is requiered
plugins\/blink_camera\/plugin_info\/conf.Afficher la vignette de caméra s'il n'y: Show camera thumbnail if no video available?
plugins\/blink_camera\/plugin_info\/conf.Bloquer l'accès aux URLs des vidéos et i: Block access to video and image URLs without being authenticated in Jeedom?
plugins\/blink_camera\/plugin_info\/conf.Vous allez recevoir un SMS de Blink avec: You will received a SMS from Blink with a pin code, you must fill it here and clic  "Send".
plugins\/blink_camera\/plugin_info\/conf.Les vignettes de vidéos ne sont pas disp: The thumbnails of the videos are not available if you use a local storage(USB).
plugins\/blink_camera\/plugin_info\/conf.Ne pas télécharger les vidéos/images à l: Do not download videos/images when opening the view (faster loading)
plugins\/blink_camera\/plugin_info\/conf.Inclure les vidéos/images des caméras da: Include videos/images of cameras in the Jeedom backup ?
plugins\/blink_camera\/plugin_info\/conf.backup desc:
WARNING !
Be carefull : size of Jeedom backups can be very important
plugins\/blink_camera\/plugin_info\/conf.Mode eco desc:
This mode limits the amount of data exchanged in the historical view:
  • between Jeedom and your browser: a video is downloaded to your browser only when you click on it.
  • between Blink and Jeedom servers: only data already present on Jeedom is displayed.

plugins\/blink_camera\/core\/class\/blin.Mode hors ligne: Warning the plugin is offline (check the plugin configuration)
plugins\/blink_camera\/core\/class\/blin.Impossible de se connecter au compte Bli: Can not connect to Blink account. Check your identifiant and password in plugin configuration.
plugins\/blink_camera\/core\/class\/blin.Login limit exceeded. Please disable any: The connection limit on the Blink servers has been reached. The Jeedom plugin automatically disconnects (widgets and history view) but do not open the configuration page for 60 minutes.
plugins\/blink_camera\/core\/class\/blin.Login attempted too quickly. Please try: Login attempted too quickly. Please try again in a few seconds.

plugins\/blink_camera\/desktop\/js\/blin.ex : cmd=tts|value=Mon texte TTS (voir d: ex : cmd=tts|value=Mon texte TTS (see documentation for more information)
plugins\/blink_camera\/desktop\/js\/blin.Liste de valeurs au format \\'<id>|<text: List of values in format \ ' <id> | <texte> ; <id> | <texte> ; ... \ '\ n If the command is named \' cmdlist_ <XXX> \ ', <id> => <commandes> (with ^ for separator), otherwise use \ '# listValue # \' to retrieve <id> in the list of commands.
